body.name: Ambi African Black Soap Face & Body Bar, Cleans and Nourishes Skin, Rinses Clear, 5.3 Ounce
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 12 hrs 49 mins
features: Infused with a nutrient and antioxidant-rich proprietary blend with natural Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Cocoa and Plantain, our premium AMBI African Black Soap Face & Body Bar goes beyond cleansing to provide skin with the ultimate in moisture from head-to-toe
Helps bring soothing relief to troubled skin including dry skin and other skin irritations

The Ambi Regimen: We make dermatologist-recommended products to cleanse, moisturize and nourish, help fade dark spots and discoloration, treat acne, and even skin tone, and other solutions for melanin-rich skin

Your Skincare Journey: For smooth, even-toned, flawless looking skin try our cleansers, bar soaps, serums, moisturizers and fade creams specifically formulated for and by those with diverse skin tones
The Skin Tone Authority: For 50 years, Ambi has been rooted in catering to the skincare needs of women of color, blending science and nature to create affordable, high-quality skincare products

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best soap ever
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this brand of soap since I was in middle school which was many moons ago, and it is still an excellent brand of soap and still works great on my skin. It keeps my skin moisturized without the build up of regular soap band it keep my skin clean and clear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the LARGE size of this soap...
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy and satisfied with this purchase order. It was professionally and carefully packaged and exactly as the Amazon description displays it. Thanks Seller and Amazon, I really appreciate this quality product. I do recommend this product and would purchase it again in the future.Even though I haven't seen any immediate results as of yet, which I know will take some time to be seen after continuous usage. But, I just love the LARGE bar size and the soapy lather I get from it. It smells great and feels good on my skin, and it doesn't leave any residue on my skin at all (thank God).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I think it's working
reviews.reviewText: I think its working, I'm seeing less spots in my face, but I'm giving it more time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Real cleans and feels good on skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This bar is huge!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have been using black soap for a while and I love it! With the rebrand I couldn’t find any “black soap” in stores. It was shea butter soap or something. So I gave Amazon a whirl and I’m pretty sure this is the same product I’ve been buying in stores but the bar is so much bigger! My skin hasn’t reacted differently to this soap so I’m going to stick with ordering it here. I love the Ambi black soap, the moisturizer, and the fade cream!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the second time I purchased this soap. It is evening my skin tone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it for Body AND Face
reviews.reviewText: I only use African black soap for my body - it seems to be the only stuff that ensures I don't get body acne. So far my skin has loved this brand of soap (I typically buy Shea Moisture) and I really love the lather and the SIZE of the bar. It's nice and big and will last longer than typical bars. I'm a goth at heart so I love the black bar.I'm starting to try this on my face, as well, to see how my skin handles it. It gives me a bit too much of a squeaky clean feel but it's more affordable than my facewash I've been using so hopefully my skin adjusts.Update: my skin hs adjusted and my face is taking to this soap rather well. Super happy!
